name: UIPreviewInteractionDelegate
desc: A set of methods for communicating the progress of a preview interaction.

items.name: func previewInteractionShouldBegin(UIPreviewInteraction) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether a preview interaction is allowed to begin.

items.name: func previewInteraction(UIPreviewInteraction, didUpdatePreviewTransition: CGFloat, ended: Bool)
items.desc: Informs the delegate of the progress through the preview phase of the preview interaction.

items.name: func previewInteraction(UIPreviewInteraction, didUpdateCommitTransition: CGFloat, ended: Bool)
items.desc: Informs the delegate of the preview interaction's progress through the commit phase.

items.name: func previewInteractionDidCancel(UIPreviewInteraction)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the specified preview interaction was canceled.
